subject: Support for JUnit
msgSnippet: My company has started to use JUnit as a testing tool for our Java development. We are considering making it an organizationally approved tool for our
messageBody:
My company has started to use JUnit as a testing tool for our Java development. We are considering making it an 'organizationally approved' tool for our development environment. In order to accomplish this, we will perform a technical evaluation of the tool and submit an 'to be approved' recommendation to our Standards Committee. A 'Support Plan' must accompany the request for approval. Consequently, I am researching support that is available for the tool.

Do you have any specific information regarding JUnit support? Have any articles been written on the subject? Has a "Support Plan" been written by one of Junit's users.

I have visited the SourceForge site as well as JUnit.org, so I am generally familiar with what is there.

Does anyone provide telephone support?

Thank you for any information you can provide.

Penny Heatherington
Project Lead
OppenheimerFunds
